trait.name: Bluerot
trait.text: This disease target humanoids. While afflicted with bluerot, a victim grows grotesque blue boils on their face and back. This disease is carried by undead (including the drowned ones in Tammeraut's Fate), and victims most often acquire it through wounds caused by infected creatures.

The disease's boils manifest in 1d4 hours, causing the victim's Constitution and Charisma scores to decrease by 1d4 each, to a minimum of 3. This is quickly followed by a fever and tingling in the extremities. An infected creature is vulnerable to radiant damage and gains the ability to breathe underwater.

On a failed saving throw, the victim takes 18 (4d8) necrotic damage as the boils burst and spread. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage cannot regain hit points until the disease is cured, though it can be stabilized as normal.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
trait.text: The wave shaper can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
trait.text: The wave shaper can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited tele pathy.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The wave shaper's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: message
1/day: comprehend languages

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The wave shaper makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

action.name: Whirlpool (1/Day)
action.text: The wave shaper targets a body ofwater at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is incapacitated. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check.

When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and is caught in the vortex until it ends. On a success, the creature takes half damage and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortexcan use its action to tryto swim away from the vortex as described above, but it has disadvantage on the Strength (Athletics) check to do so.
The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. This damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.

Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, minor illusion, ray of frost
1st level (4 slots): charm person, color spray, magic missile, silent image
2nd level (2 slots): magic mouth, scorching ray

monster.spells: Dancing Lights, Minor Illusion, Ray of Frost, Charm Person, Color Spray, Magic Missile, Silent Image, Magic Mouth, Scorching Ray

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the sea lion.

trait.name: Magic Resistance

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attock: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.name: Disassemble
trait.text: If the juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, twelve skeletons rise from its remains.

trait.name: Falling Apart
trait.text: If the Juggernaut does not have all of its hit points at the start of its turn, it loses 10 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The juggernaut makes two claws attacks.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Avalanche of Bones (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The juggernaut collapses into a large heap before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked prone.

monster.name: Skeletal Swarm
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Deafening Clatter
trait.text: Creatures are deafened while in the swarm's space.

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small humanoid. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Slash
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Abolethic Vassal
trait.text: The skum is permanently charmed by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The skum can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
trait.text: The skum is immune to the frightened and charmed conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
trait.text: The skum takes 6 (1d12) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The skum makes three attacks: two with its trident and one with its Mind-Breaking Touch.

action.name: Trident
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Mind-Breaking Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of the skum's next turn.

monster.name: Storm Giant Quintessent
monster.resist: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The giant can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks or uses Wind javelin twice.

action.name: Lightning Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

action.name: Wind Javelin
action.text: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary.name: Gust
legendary.text: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary.name: Thunderbolt (2 Actions)
legendary.text: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: One with the Storm (3 Actions)
legendary.text: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

monster.name: Swarm of Rot Grubs
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: The target is infested by 1d4 rot grubs. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage per rot grub infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these rot grubs. After this time, these rot grubs are too far under the skin to be burned.
If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all rot grubs infesting the target.

trait.text: Thousand Teeth can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
trait.text: If Thousand Teeth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Bite

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.text: Thousand Teeth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Lunge
legendary.text: Thousand Teeth moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Bite (2 Actions)
legendary.text: Thousand Teeth makes a bite attack.

monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If the statue fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Claws

legendary.name: Bite

legendary.name: Blood Reaper
